message:
Hi...I really needs a help please
First of all I was going to install win8.1 instead of win10 so I inserted the DVD and formatted the C partition but few minutes later the installation stopped and gave me an error so used minitool partitioning trying to fix.then found that setting partitions in active mode isn't available''not exist not''exists but hidden''  ''...so formatted C again and deleted it and created it again but didn't find the setting active option again. ..so restarted the laptop and found this!!! Putting the installation DVD or the minitool cd and getting nothing but this! !so please help it's full with very important data. ..please please help!

data.message: inbox. we'll repair it together step by step
